body.name: HOGOKIDS 3-in-1 Girls Camper Van Building Set - 494PCS Beach Camping Building Blocks Kit | Friends City Bus Building Toys with Slide and Cute Stickers | Gifts for Girls Boys Age 6 7 8 9 10 11 12+

features: 3 IN 1 BUILDING BLOCK SET - This HOGOKIDS 3 in 1 building toy set featuring a campervan, summer shop and friendship bus, each building block set allows kids to build one model. Each toy building set comes with lots of cute little accessories, amusing stickers and lots of amazing details! This beach building toy will provide hours of enjoyable building experience for girls and boys!

WONDERFUL DRIVING JOURNEY- This girl's building kit comes with realistic props such as a barbecue grill, slide, swimming ring, outdoor viewing platform and more. Kids can build a friendship bus to get around the city, a camper van to enjoy the natural beauty of the countryside, or a seaside store and paddling in the pool. Let the kids use their endless imagination and embark on an amazing journey with this multi-functional building block playset!

LEARNING WHILE PLAYING - HOGOKIDS Girls Building Set is an excellent STEM toy. During the enjoyable building process, this STEM building toy can exercise your child's hand-eye coordination, logical thinking, problem solving and social skills. Three different fun models helps foster creativity in both boys and girls, allowing them to immerse themselves in the joyful art of building away from the temptations of cell phones and computers.

BEST GIFT CHOICE FOR KIDS - This camper van building block kit comes in a beautiful gift box, which is the perfect Christmas and birthday gift for boys and girls who love cars and are keen to explore. In addition, this beautiful city series of block building set is also an eye-catching decorative item, perfect for placing in study, bedroom, living room and so on.

CHILDREN'S SAFETY ALWAYS COMES FIRST - This well design building playset is made of high-quality ABS material, non-toxic, odorless, brightly colored and sturdy enough to withstand long hours of play. Each block building set includes a full-color manual to provide your child with clear instructions for girls and boys ages 6 7 8 9 10 11 12.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Liked by child

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 5 yr old granddaughter loved this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This is not for a child to put together
reviews.reviewText: It says it’s for a child six and up it took my son who is 36 years old to put this together for over an hour so a kid cannot put this together.

Kit che contiene 486 pezzi di blocchi da costruzione, che possono essere utilizzati per costruire tre diversi modelli, un camper van, un autobus urbano, e un campeggio, i blocchi sono realizzati in resistente plastica, e semplici da assemblare combaciando perfettamente, kit che include anche un set di adesivi che possono essere utilizzati per decorare i modelli, è divertente decorare i modelli piante e altri oggetti, il modello del van particolarmente dettagliato, ha un tetto apribile, una porta scorrevole, e un'area di soggiorno interna, l'interno del camper è arridato con divano tavolo e cucina un buon modellino assemblabile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter loved this. Bright, colorful, sturdy and reasonably priced.
So wie beschrieben und pünktliche Lieferung

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a lovely set. Requires much concentration to ensure it’s fitted exactly as the instructions picture and some parts are particularly tricky even for an adult. I very much enjoyed quality time with my daughter making it ( she’s 8.5years)
